law.catch_line: The Board shall issue a license to any applicant who:...

text.section:
The Board shall issue a license to any applicant who:
Pays a license fee set by the Board; and
Otherwise meets the requirements of this title.

The Board shall include on each license that it issues:
Its seal; and
Designations that clearly distinguish between those licensees who may practice chiropractic and those who may practice chiropractic with the right to practice physical therapy.
